power.theatre.brown_thumb.name: Brown Thumb
power.theatre.brown_thumb.description: You're bad with plants, but you grew to appreciate your anti-talent. You can corrupt plants and you know how to take better care of them.
power.theatre.frail_mind.name: Panic! At The Corpsefield
power.theatre.frail_mind.description: You aren't good at handeling stress, you're jumpy, you're a mess. Even small things can hurt you a lot when you are insane.
power.theatre.scare_flying_spectres.name: Formidophobia
power.theatre.scare_flying_spectres.desc: You being a mess isn't all bad, because flying creatures are afraid of you.
